original: <<MAP BY TORMACOY>>
***THIS THE LOCATION OUR AGENTS REPORTED. THERE SHOULD BE AN ENEMY FACILITY SOMEWHERE INSIDE THIS TEMPLE***
zh_trans: ***这是我们特工报告的地点。 这座寺庙里应该有敌人的设施***

original: *** WE MUST FIND AND DESTROY IT. WATCH OUT FOR ZOMBIES, THIS PLACE IS INFESTED WITH THEM***
zh_trans: *** 我们必须找到并摧毁它。小心僵尸，这里到处都是***

original: ***NOW LET'S MOVE ON***
***THIS PLATFORM SEEM LIKE AN ELEVATOR...***
***UNLOCKING THE FRONT DOOR...***
*** THIS IS THE ENTRANCE TO THE TEMPLE...***
***HOLD THEM OFF WHILE WE FIGURE OUT HOW TO OPEN IT***
zh_trans: *** 拖住他们，我们再想办法打开 ****

original: ***ALMOST THERE...***
*** DONE. ITS OPENING. RUN ***
***HOLD THE LINE WHILE THE OTHERS INVESTIGATE THE AREA***
zh_trans: ***在其他人调查该区域时，守住阵线***

original: ***THAT BUTTON ON THE FLOOR SHOULD OPEN THE DOOR***
zh_trans: ***地板上的那个按钮应该能打开门***

original: *** WELL DONE. THAT SHOULD OPEN THE DOOR***
zh_trans: *** 干得好，这应该能打开大门***

original: *** WATCH OUT THE BUTTON OPENED ALL THE DOORS IN THE AREA***
zh_trans: *** 小心，这个按钮打开了这个区域的所有门 ****

original: ***UNLOCKING SIDE DOOR...***
***5 SECONDS LEFT. PREPARE TO RUN***
*** THE DOOR IS OPENING. RUN***
*** WE SHOULD SPLIT UP HERE AND CHECK BOTH PATHS***
zh_trans: *** 我们应该分头检查这两条路 ***

original: ***HOLD FOR A BIT , THE DOOR SHOULD OPEN SOON***
***HOLD HERE A FEW SECONDS WHILE WE UNLOCK THE DOOR***
***THAT SHOULD OPEN THE DOOR IN 25 SECONDS. DEFEND***
zh_trans: ***大门应该在25秒后开启。防守这里***

original: *** HOLD THEM OFF! THE OTHER TEAM NEEDS TIME TO OPEN THE DOOR***
zh_trans: *** 拖住他们。另一个小队需要点时间来开门***

original: ***10 SECONDS LEFT***
***5 SECONDS. PREPARE TO RUN***
*** HOLD A FEW SECONDS WHILE THE DOOR OPENS***
***KEEP IT UP***
***ITS GONNA OPEN PREPARE TO RUN***
***WE NEED TO KEEP GOING. WATCH OUT FOR THE TRAPS HERE!***
zh_trans: ***我们得继续前进。小心这里的陷阱！***

original: ***SEEMS LIKE THE LEFT SIDE IS BLOCKED, GO TO THE RIGHT***
***THE WAY IS BLOCKED TOO, WE MUST FIND A WAY TO UNLOCK THOSE BARS***
zh_trans: ***这里的路也被堵住了，我们必须想办法打开那些栅栏***

original: ***THAT SOULD OPEN THE BARS***
***KEEP DEFENDING. WE DONT KNOW HOW MUCH TIME IT WILL TAKE TO OPEN**
zh_trans: ***继续防守 我们不知道打开需要多少时间**

original: ***THE BARS ARE OPENING! GO GO GO!***
***THE STAIRS ARE BLOCKED. BREAK THROUGH THE CAVE ***
*** THE ENEMY FACILITY SHOULD BE AT THE OTHER SIDE OF THIS CAVE. SET UP A C4 IN THAT WALL.***
zh_trans: *** 敌人的设施应该在洞穴的另一侧。在墙壁上安放一个 C4.***

original: **C4 ARMED. IT WILL EXPLODE IN 20 SECONDS.***
zh_trans: **C4 已安放。在 20 秒后爆炸。

original: *** 10 SECONDS LEFT!***
*** GET OUT IT'S GOING TO EXPLODE ***
***THIS IS THE ENEMY FACILITY. NOW WE NEED TO MAKE OUR WAY TO THE CORE AND DESTROY IT***
zh_trans: ***这是敌人的设施。现在我们需要前往核心区并摧毁它****

original: ***SEND A TEAM AHEAD TO EXPLORE , WHILE THE REST KEEPS WINNING TIME!!!***
zh_trans: ***派一队人前去探索，其余的人继续争取时间！！***

original: ***WE WILL USE THIS ELEVATOR TO MAKE OUR WAY TO THE CORE***
zh_trans: ***我们将乘坐这部电梯前往核心区***

original: ***IT'S NOT WORKING...***
***SHIT!! THE SYSTEM IS PROTECTED!. GIVE ME SOME TIME TO CRACK INTO IT***
zh_trans: ***妈的！系统受到保护。给我点时间破解它***

original: ***HALF WAY THERE...***
***CRACKED!! THE ELEVATOR LEAVES IN 10 SECONDS. GET IN TEAM!!
zh_trans: ***破解成功！电梯10秒后离开。快上来！！

original: ***KEEP GOING. I WILL OPEN THE DOORS FOR YOU***
zh_trans: ***继续前进 我会为你打开大门***

original: *** FIRST DOOR OPENS IN 5 SECONDS***
zh_trans: *** 第一扇门在 5 秒后打开****

original: *** SECOND DOOR OPENS IN 10 SECONDS***
zh_trans: *** 第二扇门将在 10 秒后打开****

original: *** THIRD DOOR OPENS IN 10 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 第三扇门将在 10 秒后打开 ***

original: *** THIS DOOR MAY TAKE SOME TIME TO OPEN. HOLD YOUR GROUND ! ***
zh_trans: *** 这扇门可能需要一些时间才能打开。坚守阵地 ！ ***

original: *** 5 MORE SECONDS***
***FUCK!! THERES A SECOND DOOR!! GIVE ME 10 MORE SECONDS TO OPEN IT ***
zh_trans: ***他妈的！还有一扇门 再给我10秒钟打开它***

original: *** LIFT WARMING UP. HOLD THEM***
*** LIFT LEAVING IN 10 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 电梯将在 10 秒后离开 ***

original: ***ANOTHER WAREHOUSE...DOESNT SEEM TO HAVE AN EXIT***
***OUR INFO POINTS THAT THE CORE IS STILL FAR FROM US. WE NEED TO KEEP GOING.***
zh_trans: ***我们的情报表明，我们距离核心区仍有一段距离。我们需要继续前进***

original: *** MAYBE WE CAN TAKE THAT VENT ON SIDE TO SEE WHERE IT TAKES US***
zh_trans: *** 我们或许可以打开旁边的通风管道，看看它能把我们带到哪里去****

original: ***FUCK! THAT DOOR HAS SOME EXTRA SECURITY. GIVE ME A FEW SECONDS***
zh_trans: ***妈的 那扇门有额外的安全措施 给我几秒钟***

original: ***SHIIIT!! SECURITY IS REALLY STRONG ON THIS ONE!! NEED MORE TIME TEAM! RESIST THERE!***
zh_trans: ***我靠!! 这扇门的安全系统是块硬骨头!! 再给我一点时间!! 守住!***

original: *** ITS OPEN . MOVE TEAM!! GO!!
zh_trans: *** 门已经打开。 队伍动起来！ 走！！

original: ***Cracking sewer doors...***
*** 10 SECONDS LEFT***
***THE TRAM STATION IS AHEAD. HOLD YOUR GROUND WHILE OTHERS GO AHEAD TO POWER IT ON***
zh_trans: ***电车站就在前面。 需要有人去打开电源，其他人则坚守阵地***

original: ***TRAM ACTIVATED. IT WILL LEAVE IN 30 SECONDS***
***TRAM LEAVES IN 10 SECONDS***
***ELEVATOR LEAVING IN 25 SECONDS***
***ELEVATOR LEAVING IN 10 SECONDS***
***ELEVATOR LEAVING IN 5 SECONDS***
***OPENING DOOR...***
***HOLD FOR A MOMENT HERE...***
***THIS MUST BE THE LAST DOOR BEFORE THE REACTOR AREA. GET READY....***
zh_trans: ***这一定是前往核心区的最后一扇门。做好准备....****

original: ***THE DOOR TO ACCESS THE CORE IS LOCKED...***
***TO OPEN IT GO TO THOSE DOORS ON THE SIDE OF THIS ROOM AND FIND SOME COMPUTERS TO CRACK THE SYSTEM***
zh_trans: ***请前往两边侧门的房间，并找到电脑破解系统来打开这扇门***

original: ***THEN USE THE COMPUTER IN THE MIDDLE ROOM TO UNLOCK IT***
zh_trans: ***然后用中间房间里的电脑解锁大门****

original: ***RIGHT SIDE BUTTON PRESSED. CRACKING...***
***RIGHT SIDE CRACKED***
***SHOOT THOSE THINGS. THAT WILL DESTROY THE REACTOR***
zh_trans: ***向反应堆开枪！这样可以摧毁核心***

original: ***LEFT SIDE BUTTON PRESSED. CRACKING...***
***ONCE DONE ESCAPE THROUGH THE DOOR ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE ROOM***
zh_trans: ***一旦完成从房间另一侧的门逃走***

original: ***LEFT SIDE CRACKED***
***BOTH SIDES HAVE BEEN CRACKED. USE THE CENTRAL COMPUTER TO GAIN ACCESS TO THE CORE***
zh_trans: ***两侧均已破解。 使用中央计算机获取核心访问权限***

original: ***THE DOOR SHOULD OPEN SOON...***
***HOLD THEM OFF, THESE DOORS WILL TAKE SOME TIME TO OPEN...***
zh_trans: ***拖住他们，这些门需要一些时间才能打开......***

original: ***WE ARE CLOSE THE EXIT TEAM. THE DOORS SHOULD OPEN SOON. HOLD THEM OFF***
zh_trans: **我们正在接近撤离小组。门很快开启，守住***

original: ***DOORS OPEN IN 10 SECONDS***
***CRACKING ELEVATOR SYSTEM...***
***ELEVATOR LEAVES IN 10 SECONDS. GET IN TEAM!!!***
zh_trans: ***电梯 10 秒钟后启动，快上来！***

original: *** MISSION COMPLETE. NICE WORK TEAM***
zh_trans: *** 任务完成。干得好，伙计们****

original: ***DEPLOYING BRIDGE IN A FEW SECONDS...***
***CANT ACCESS THOSE DOORS, FIND A COMPUTER AND OPEN THEM***
zh_trans: ***无法进入这些门，找台电脑打开它们***

original: ***BOTTOM DOOR OPENS IN 10 SECONDS***
***THIS LEADS TO THE REACTOR AREA.USE THAT COMPUTER TO GIVE ME ACCESS TO THE DOOR SYSTEM AND CRACK INTO IT***
zh_trans: ***这里通向核心区，使用那台电脑我才能进入门禁系统并破解它****

original: ***UPPER DOOR OPENS IN 10 SECONDS***
zh_trans: *** 上层门将在 10 秒后打开 ****

original: ***CRACKING INTO THE DOOR SYSTEM...***
***CRACK COMPLETED. GO NOW TEAM!***
